notes.text: We now ensure that the analytical table supports the contextdefiningproperties annotation
We now ensure that back-end errors in the upload table are always displayed
We've resolved an issue where the Chart building block didn't load in extension fragments
We've resolved an issue with the action parameter dialog where the type-ahead popup opens automatically when the focus is on the first field
We now ensure that back-end errors in the upload table are always displayed
We've resolved an issue where the parameter dialog could not be used with empty multi-input fields
We've now enabled the pagination feature again for all value help dropdowns
We now correctly format the group header in a table when no context is available
We now support the runtime instantiation of the Chart building block
We now support the sorting of data in micro charts
We’ve removed the error message that appeared when a user pasted data from a spreadsheet into a table on the object page
You can now add additional custom fields to the top of the mass edit dialog
Key users can now make changes to the manifest.json file
We now ensure that the default format for date values in a table is HH:MM
You can now use the context menu to create a new object in the tree table
You can now use the createDocument API to create a document using the Table building block
We've resolved an issue where the filters applied on the insights cards weren't reflecting when the end user navigated back to the app.
We now support key user adaptation on the mass edit dialog
We've resolved an issue where the quick view popover showed no data for an analytical table used in the list report
We now enable the selection of table rows when the Copy to Clipboard button is visible
We now ensure that the selected file format is correctly shown in the error dialog when an incorrect media type is uploaded
We now properly translate the editing status column on the table personalization
We’ve added SAP Collaboration Manager as a further option to the “Share” menu
We now consider the ParameterDefaultValue annotation when triggering the setOperationDefaultValues function
You can now define a custom “save” logic for the Mass Edit dialog using the extensionAPI
We now provide a dialog enabling users to directly create a new object in a list report without triggering a navigation to the object page afterwards
We’ve resolved an issue where labels were duplicated in the sort section of the table personalization dialog for navigation properties where TextArrangement is set to TextOnly
We now support "Pattern" as a format option for date-and-time-based controls
We've increased the data load threshold to 500 values for the value help dropdown list
We now ensure that the correct metamodel is passed to the removeSensitive data function
We now ensure that the ResultIsActiveEntity property is not taken into account when triggering the setOperationDefaultValues function
We've increased the data load threshold to 200 values for the value help dropdown list
In InlineCreationRows mode, we now correctly highlight newly created rows in a table
We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
We now check for the first field that is visible on the action parameter dialog and correctly focus on it
You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
We've resolved an issue where charts configured with a relative metaPath and contextPath didn't load
We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
We've resolved an issue with internationalization of field labels in the parameter dialog
We've resolved an issue where the sort icon in the column wasn't functioning correctly
We now ensure that the application works correctly when the personalization settings of a chart are set to false
The mass edit functionality now works for fields containing a composite binding
We now ensure that the RichTextEditor building block with metadata can be used with a button group aggregation
We've now resolved an issue where the draft indicator wasn't displayed for the draft of an active record
We’ve resolved an issue where the app was failing to load while creating a default variant that involved removing and adding a field
We now ensure that the value help field with fixed values in the action parameter dialog shows the correct values
We now support uploading various file types as attachments on the object page
We now ensure that the implicit semantic object mappings containing sensitive data are not passed to the target application
We've resolved an issue with value help condition propagation when there are no conditions
The RichTextEditor is now correctly displayed in edit mode when an object is created
We now use a modifer to retrieve the existing PropertyInfo when the Remove condition is called
We now ensure that the display property of action parameters is correctly calculated using the ValueList reference annotations
Adding items in a multi-input field with side effects now works correctly
We now ensure the default values of action parameters are defined before setting them as binding data
We've resolved an issue with the value help within the filter fields that caused the VariantManagement building block to not load properly
We now also consider the text arrangement annotation when a second filter field with a value help is opened from within a value help dialog
Tables in the value help dialog are now rendered as responsive tables on mobile devices
We now ignore errors for canceled value help requests from older contexts
We've resolved an issue where the filter field displayed an incorrect value upon application reload
We now accurately detect the file type when uploading files using stream support
We now consider the enableAutoColumnWidth and widthIncludingColumnHeader properties in the manifest.json file when adding a column to a table
